CancelMessageResponse.name: CancelMessageResponse
CancelMessageResponse.description: Grants permission to cancel a response to a message

CreateConversation.name: CreateConversation
CreateConversation.description: Grants permission to create a conversation

DeleteConversation.name: DeleteConversation
DeleteConversation.description: Grants permission to delete a conversation

ListConversationMessages.name: ListConversationMessages
ListConversationMessages.description: Grants permission to list conversation messages

NotifyConversationIsActive.name: NotifyConversationIsActive
NotifyConversationIsActive.description: Grants permission to notify whether there is activity in a conversation

SendConversationMessage.name: SendConversationMessage
SendConversationMessage.description: Grants permission to send a conversation message
